short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights all occurences of the current text selection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mark My Words allows to highlight all the occurrences of the current text selection by the user. This shall speed up the looking for related information in length documents.
Similar behaviour is achieved by using Chrome's "Find"-Function, but needs less interaction.
Sometime misses positives, this is future work.

From version 0.10 URLs and email addresses are not highlighted anymore.
